1.text:
### QuestionMaster 
 Choose one question as a team, everybody on the other team has to answer.

2.text:
### Hit the Deck 
 Everyone drop to the ground and lay with their forehead down.  Last one there has to stay on the ground for three turns.

3.text:
### Storytime 
 Tell a funny story from back when you were in high school.

4.text:
### Storytime 
 Tell a wild college story.

5.text:
### Bottoms Up 
 Choose someone on the opposite team
